如何杀死疯狂的撒旦魔鬼团伙谁打算杀死你们所有人，并窃取你的国家。

注意在你的社区，如果你看到或听到任何疯狂的撒旦团伙困扰你或任何人，立即开始阅读圣经阅读直接讲话从国王耶稣基督首先在新约圣经，因为"耶稣" 然后读一些圣经的旧约，并祈祷一个快速的简短祈祷与thansgiving和赞美父神耶和华王，在他儿子的名字，国王耶稣基督。 确保你通过相信耶稣基督王耶和华而得到救赎，并且已经悔改（权杖），阅读圣经并遵守他的话语，所以父神耶和华王会帮助你。 确保你总是有你的圣经与你，并观看，使疯狂的撒旦不偷圣经从你的手中，你正在阅读。 也要记住一些在你的头上，所以如果没有机会拿出你的圣经，或者晚上没有光明，在疯狂的撒旦逃跑之前，从你的头上引用一些新旧的经文。 有时候，如果狂撒但继续困扰，读完圣经后，手上放一点水，把水洒在你周围的地板上，喝一点油和水。 确保你吃物理食物，所以你的身体强壮，以保护自己。 有时疯狂的撒旦想在他们停止困扰之前看到身体。 他们不知道，只有耶和华王耶稣基督的话在圣经中是精神食粮，杀死疯狂的撒旦团伙。 这就是耶和华王耶稣如何帮助我，也是为什么我在这里大胆地侮辱疯狂的撒但，他现在已经从我的地区逃到地狱的火中。
耶和华王说圣灵的刀是神的话。 疯狂的英国头撒旦已经欺骗了全世界的军队/警察携带一把假剑枪，让他们忘记真正的耶和华王的灵剑，这是上帝王耶和华的话。

He was in the tomb for 3 days, and then Father God raised Jesus to life.He (Jesus) appeared before people, & then ascended back up to heaven.  We must receive Holy Jesus sincerely to be His child(John 1:12).  We must repent & believe the Gospel for the kingdom of God is at hand.  (Mark 1:15).  So many people do not understand that we need an encounter(a real one) with the Living Holy Savior Jesus! How can you have that encounter? You need to genuinely have faith in Jesus Christ & it is by grace of Christ, through faith in Him that we are saved.  He wants a real relationship with you! How can you have a real relationship with this Living, Holy  Savior? We must daily spend time seeking Jesus & daily seek the Father in heaven and the Holy Spirit.  There are three that bear record in heaven, The Father, The Word & the Holy Ghost and these three are one.  We need to seek the Lord of lords with all of our heart, mind, soul & strength all day each day.  We must deny ourself & take up our cross & follow Christ.  "And saying, the time is fulfilled, & the Kingdom of God is at hand, REPENT & BELIEVE THE GOSPEL." Mark 1:15.  Will you repent(change your mind and purpose?) Will you believe the Gospel(the Good News of Christ)? He is calling you to a relationship with Him today. Will you seek Him while He may be found? In John 14:15 Jesus said "If ye love Me, keep My commandments." Jesus is The Living Water!  Abide In Jesus Christ daily! God the Father wants a *real relationship* with you through His Holy Son (The Savior) Jesus Christ! Will you cry out to Jesus Christ the Sinless One today to be born again and to start a relationship with Him and stay with Him?
